select at.id, at.aircode, at.startCityId, at.startDate, at.arriveCityId, at.arriveDate, at.planeType, sac.name sac_name, sac.airport sac_airport, sac.pinyin sac_pinyin,sac.ICAOCode sac_ICAOCode, aac.name aac_name, aac.airport aac_airport, aac.pinyin aac_pinyin, aac.ICAOCode aac_ICAOCode from air_ticket at LEFT JOIN air_city sac on at.startCityId = sac.id LEFT JOIN air_city aac ON at.arriveCityId = aac.id WHERE ishot = 1
